name: KABOOOOM!
description:
BREAKING NEWS! A crash is about to happen, fasten your seat belt! KABOOOOM! is an open world action game, where the player takes control of cars and destroys everything in their path 🚗💥

In this cute top-down adventure game, you embody a spirit who wants to be on TV so bad that it destroys everything. You will have to possess various cars to create huge crashes all over town 👻

⚠ You must use a controller to play this game. ⚠

Credits
